package.name: Carotechs_Audittrack
package.summary: Audit Track extension is simple but powerful mechanism to log and track the changes in various entities like Product, Category, Attribute, Price Rules and Customer.
package.description:
Audit Track extension is simple but powerful mechanism to log and track the changes in various entities like Product, Category, Attribute, Price Rules and Customer.
It also allows to send email notification when the product price is updated.
